Text.Page:
entered Diranas Quarry and drank the invisibility potion Hagand provided.
While so concealed, collected Relativity Stones right under the noses of demokrons and the Parthians.

Where are you going now? Diranas Quarry in Famine Valley?

I believe you might be on a fool's errandâ€”no one has ever gotten so much as a spark from that teleportal.

But you seem competent, so I trust you will at least return alive. Good luck."We need that teleportal working, or we're all doomed."

Hagand request stone!

Gold much!

Hagand experiment, want stone!"Can I trust you?"

Trust Guikol? Maybe.

Trust Hagand, sure.

Trust gold? Of course!"I get it."

Stones, too many! Too heavy!

Hide stones, in pile. Not far!

Get help, come back, carry stones."Fine."
(This must be the pile of stones Guikol told you about.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This looks like the place."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
